title: Always Ascending
description: A sleek, dark-tone web presence blending media, music, events, and merch. The site highlights content with smooth transitions and an immersive layout.

title: Zen New Tab
description: A minimalistic, customizable new tab extension with quick links, weather, quotes, and a smooth dark/light interface for productivity and aesthetics.

title: Gradient Generator
description: Easily create beautiful gradients with customizable colors. Users can export their designs for use in websites, graphics, and apps.

title: QR & Barcode Generator
description: Create QR codes and barcodes with responsive, modern UX. The generator supports multiple formats and offers instant downloads.

title: Finetouch Maintenance
description: Professional maintenance and contracting company website. It provides clear service descriptions and easy contact options for clients.

title: El Colorado Construction
description: Residential construction & landscaping company site. The website showcases past projects and offers straightforward service inquiries.

title: Paramo Construction
description: Roofing & exterior services with clean layout. Visitors can easily navigate the services and request quotes online.

title: In the Dog House TX
description: Pet boarding and daycare website with booking info. It provides detailed care options and a gallery for pet parents to explore.

title: Pomochi
description: Countdown timer designed for focus. Users can set multiple sessions and track their productivity easily.

title: Simple Invoice Generator
description: Fast, minimal invoice tool for freelancers. It allows creating and downloading professional invoices in seconds.

title: PayPal Fees Calculator
description: Tool to calculate fees for freelancers. Users can quickly estimate charges and adjust payments accurately.

title: Currency Converter
description: Sleek converter with live rates and charts. It provides real-time exchange information and visualizes trends efficiently.
